channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump vows to ‘fund SNAP as soon as possible’ if court allows, blasts Democrats over shutdown delay
item.description: Trump is seeking a court ruling on SNAP payments during the government shutdown as 42 million Americans face uncertainty over November food stamp bene...

item.title: VP JD Vance dresses up as his own viral meme for Halloween, social media post tops 15 million views
item.description: JD Vance's Halloween meme video goes viral with 13 million views as vice president embraces the trolls, turning online ridicule into social media gold...

item.title: Federal judge blocks Trump order requiring citizenship proof on federal voter registration forms

item.title: Illinois lawmakers pass bill banning ICE immigration arrests near courthouses
item.description: Illinois lawmakers passed a bill blocking federal immigration arrests near courthouses and allowing civil lawsuits for constitutional rights violation...

item.title: Research monkeys got loose after a truck overturned on a highway. Their owner, destination, and exact purpose remain shrouded in mystery
item.description: The Mississippi crash is one of at least three major monkey escapes in the U.S. over the past four years.

item.title: Charlie Puth Tacitly Disavows Abortion Advocacy With Musical Musings On His Unborn Child
item.description: Regardless of whether he would affirm it outright, Charlie Puth's musical reflections shine on the dignity of human life at all its stages.

item.title: Virginia state Senate approves constitutional amendment to allow mid-decade redistricting
item.description: The Virginia state Senate on Friday approved a constitutional amendment to allow the Legislature to redraw the state's congressional districts.

item.title: Federal judge rules Trump can't require citizenship proof on the federal voting form
item.description: President Donald Trump's request to add a documentary proof of citizenship requirement to the federal voter registration form cannot be enforced, a fe...

item.title: Trump’s Cease-Fire with China
item.description: It was probably the best that could be expected from the bad options.

item.title: Crypto’s big ‘Uptober’ ends with a whimper, Bitcoin down 4%
item.description: While October didn’t bring in big wins for Bitcoin, one analyst says there’s reason to be optimistic for the cryptocurrency’s growth.

item.title: Some Americans will hand out food to trick-or-treaters this Halloween as SNAP benefits are about to end

item.title: Judges order Trump administration to use emergency reserves for SNAP payments during the shutdown
item.description: The administration said it wasn’t allowed to use a contingency fund of about $5 billion for the food-aid program.

item.title: Trump Should Back Doctor Visits for Abortion Drugs
item.description: Joe Biden discarded a policy that had stood for nearly all of Barack Obama’s presidency and all of Trump’s first term.

item.title: On Donald Trump’s Virtues
item.description: Trump’s many and well-known vices should not leave us unable to see that the man also has his virtues.

item.title: The U.S. Conference Of Catholic Bishops Needs To Stop Apologizing For Islam
item.description: Islam’s inherent disdain for non-Muslims must not intrude on the pieties of interfaith harmony, according to the USCCB.

item.title: Trump reveals first photos after Lincoln Bedroom's renovation in the White House
item.description: President shares before-and-after photos of renovated Lincoln Bedroom bathroom on Truth Social, featuring polished statuary marble and gold fixtures.

item.title: Michael Mann Finally Goes Away
item.description: The climate scientist tried to trample our free-speech rights, and failed.

item.title: Yes, Test Our Nukes
item.description: It would represent an advance for the U.S. nuclear deterrent and a victory of common sense over superstition.

item.title: ‘AI is way beyond the hype phase’: Experts warn businesses must reskill for the new reality
item.description: Companies must not only develop existing talent but also rethink the skills they are sourcing.
